programme.desc: A paintbrush arrives at Zeina's doorstep, forgetting what it is used for. Using her detective skill and her best friend Roy, Zeina discovers that a paintbrush is used for raking leaves... is it.

programme.title: Billy Bam Bam
programme.desc: Billy and BamBam have fun playing outside on the swing. Join them as they discover colourful hula hoops and have fun playing with them, rolling them, passing through them and dancing the hula hoop dance.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby Butterfly and all your favorite friends are here to sing and dance to Here We Go Looby Loo. Come on and join Hippo, Elephant, Giraffe and more and do the Looby loo.

programme.title: Look What I Found
programme.desc: The friends listen to music on the radio as the radio turns into a robot in space. The friends get to know the robot and dance with it until more robot friends arrive and they leave on a spaceship.

programme.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programme.desc: Come play a cool guessing game in the snow with the adorable snowies! Guess which animal makes a squeaking sound! Is it a chicken or a cat? Join the cute snowman friends and have lots of fun as they create a gorgeous gerbil.

programme.title: Charlie & the Shapes
programme.desc: Pentagon the painter decides to paint Charlie. He starts mixing colors when Blue Triangle and Cpt. Trapezoid come along. After he adds them to the picture, they realize there is still enough room in the picture to paint himself.

programme.title: Cuddlies
programme.desc: Uh Oh goes to visit his friends but is disappointed to find out that they are not home. Where can they all possibly be? Join Uh Oh as he looks for his friends and eventually finds them in his house at his surprise birthday party! Happy Birthday.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: All My Friends is a fun and cheerful children's rhyme with Lola, Charlie, Henry, Oliver, and Draco signing happily together about friends.

programme.title: Mike's Bikes
programme.desc: Tommy is having a hard time keeping his balance while riding a bike. After trying some of Mike's quirky ideas, he manages to ride like a pro with training wheels.

programme.title: Pix & Leo
programme.desc: Yay! It's a sunny day at the beach for Pix and Leo. Oh, but who is sneaking behind the tree and squirting water on them? Hmmm... Who could it be.

programme.title: Olly
programme.desc: Olly's adventure is out of this world! He's flying to the moon and Kitty, Dolly and Snail join in on the fun.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam have fun watching the bears make food together. Sometimes things don't go quite as expected but that's part of the fun.

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: While Voom Vam and Roady play together, Voom Vam gets an oil leak. Trucky and Roady come help after she gets stuck in the middle of the road. All she needs is some oil to be as good as new.

programme.title: Crafty Rafty
programme.desc: Come along and have lots of fun with paper clips! Hear the eraser nosed rooster crow! Cock A Doodle Do! Drive a car with tape as wheels! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates a decorated man with a yellow hat and crayon eyebrows.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: 'Tis the season for a fun Christmas carol with Big Bugs Band. Join the coolest bugs on Baby TV on their Xmas special musical performance and have a happy holiday! Fa la la la la la la la la.

programme.title: My Robot & I
programme.desc: Kim and Kit are decorating the yard with streamers and balloons for a birthday party! Kit doesn't know it's actually HIS birthday! Turns out - robots love surprises.

programme.title: Happy Birthday To You
programme.desc: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programme.title: Mini Matinee
programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Mexico. Jose makes himself a big hat! When it's hot and when it rains, it protects him! All the workers want a sombrero hat too and they all become friends.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: Come sing the classic ABCs along with the Egg Band.

programme.title: The World is a Wonder
programme.desc: Join Gaya the Fairy as she enjoys the warm and nice spring, the meadows, and the yellow flowers that wither and grow little tufts of white hairs just like grandfathers, only to blow away in the wind.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join BabyTV in this classic version of The Muffin Man that introduces your little ones to the adorable muffin man delivering baked goods all around town.

programme.title: Play & Learn with the Post Train
programme.desc: Join Fast Frank as he rushes off to deliver a package for Annie the Alpaca from Henrietta the Hare! Hop on the train and help find Annie! Enjoy the South Pole and the meadow on the way! Come find Annie on the cold and high mountain top filled with grass! Discover what's inside the package! A sweater.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Songs & Rhymes (remake).

programme.title: Jungle Book
programme.desc: Everyone has their own special talent, and today you're going to meet the best talents in the jungle - Leela, Gray, Adhira, and Indra... but what about Mowgli? What's his special talent.

programme.title: Ahoy Pirates
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ Join Captain Katie, Jon Jon, Beth and their faithful monkey Ari as they set sail on an adventure to find the pirate treasure. There will be animals, obstacles, puzzles and parties along the way.

programme.title: What a Wonderful Day
programme.desc: Join the wonderful friends and have a lovely time in the afternoon! Dance to the beat of the drums with birds and monkey! Come along and ride on bicycles! Enjoy the swing and slide at the playground and have lots of fun.

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: What's cooking? Mick is hungry and is getting ready to eat. Grab a plate and join Mick as he lifts up the cooking pot and discovers delicious peas and meatballs and makes a cute smiley face out of his food! Bon Appetit.

programme.title: BabyTV Studios
programme.desc: Sporting events are always exciting - especially when you're participating! Watch the crowd go wild as your child sets a new world record for the long jump.

programme.title: Charlie & the Alphabet
programme.desc: Charlie's kite flies into king K's kingdom. King K doesn't want to give Charlie his kite back. Will they be able to find a solution before the alphabet party begins.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Hippo, Elephant, Baby and Sheep all star in this fun and entertaining rendition of the all-time favorite nursery rhyme.

programme.title: Mini Matinee
programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit a village in France! Watch the town bakers stretch dough for the hungry princess till it becomes a French baguette that the princess loves! Bon Appetit.

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: Roady, Trucky and Voom Vam go to the beach to cool off on a hot summer's day. When they get to the beach, they hear a bird stuck on the littered beach. The friends quickly clean up the beach to help the bird.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: It's Robbie's birthday and everyone has come to celebrate with him - Toto, Dolly, the ducks, Horse, Elephant and Cow. Come join the celebration as they all sing him a birthday song, eat cake and enjoy his gift.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Two very different and funny travelers, the level-headed Perry and the mischievous Harley, discover that there is more than one way to solve a problem.

programme.title: Walter and Dude
programme.desc: Walter and Dude the Dog are looking for an item that opens, closes, has a stick, and is used in the rain to keep us dry. Is it an ice lolly, a clown in the box, or a blow dryer? Join the two friends as they discover it's an umbrella.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just pour it out.

programme.title: Olly
programme.desc: Kitty can't get out of her house - there's a big rock blocking her way! Luckily Olly the crane operator is here to save the day.

programme.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programme.desc: Laz, Hop and Butterson find a creative way to make a waterslide in the back yard. The fun ends when the tap is stuck and the waterflow stops. The buggy friends manage to turn it back on with a shoelace! Let the fun continue.

programme.title: Happy Birthday To You
programme.desc: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programme.title: Cuddlies
programme.desc: Tickles puts on a funny show for his friends and can't stop sneezing! His friends help him to bed and bring him a whistle to blow in case he needs anything. When Tickles doesn't stop blowing the whistle, his friends realize that he doesn't really need anything except for them to be together.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Ellie looks for the ball in the water and sees another elephant copying his movements! Ducky and Froggy see a duck and frog in the water too! Discover reflections in the water.

programme.title: Jump Out of Bed Sleepy Head
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ It's time to wake up the castle and begin the day. But first the court jesters need to solve some riddles in ordr to open the doors. Rise and Shine everyone.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: The Egg Band sings one of the classics - BINGO. Come join them and learn how to spell along the way.

programme.title: The World is a Wonder
programme.desc: Join the hen as she meets a rooster and lays three eggs! She sits on them to guard them and keep them warm! Watch the cute chicks as they hatch from their eggs and grow into hens.

programme.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programme.desc: A tambourine arrives at Zeina's doorstep, forgetting what it is used for. Using her detective skill and her best friend Roy, Zeina discovers that a tambourine is used for jumping... is it.

programme.title: Welcome to the Island
programme.desc: It's Coco's birthday and the gang have planned a surprise party for him! They even invited the Coral Reef singers! Now that's a real treat.

programme.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programme.desc: Yay! Let's play "Tickles"! It's time to laugh, play, and have lots of fun with mischievous Teeny and Tiny.

programme.title: Mike's Bikes
programme.desc: Johnny has taken apart his bicycle but can't seem to put it back together again. He turns to his good friend Mikey for some help.

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: Anybody hungry? Join Mick as he visits the vegetable garden, waters the plant with a watering can and picks some tomatoes, lettuce and carrots for a nice healthy salad he prepares and enjoys with his friends. Bon Appetit.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 2 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ciao, Konnichi wa, Marhaba - "Hello" has different names - in Italian, Japanese or Arabic. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Crafty Rafty
programme.desc: Join the seashells' dance on the beach and two sweet creatures made from shells as they sail.

programme.title: Billy Bam Bam
programme.desc: Billy and BamBam have a wonderful time taking turns swinging on the swing outside. Join them as they sing, dance and play together a game of Catch the Colours, touching the yellow flower and the green grass.

programme.title: Jungle Book
programme.desc: Today is Baloo's birthday and the students are planning a birthday surprise for their teacher. Will they manage to prepare everything before on time, right before Baloo gets to school.

programme.title: Look What I Found
programme.desc: The friends water a small plant as it becomes huge, and by sitting on the leaves, you can see the view of the city. By watering it more, the plant grows more until it reaches the clouds.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Yaya is building a tower of blocks. Maya wants to jump, do a cartwheel and play ball. The ball ruins the tower, even though Maya didn't mean it. Join the two cute elephants as they try to build the tower again, taking turns placing the building blocks on top of each other! What a tall tower.

programme.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programme.desc: Come play a cool guessing game in the snow with the adorable snowies! Guess which animal makes a meow sound! Is it a rooster or a mouse? Join the cute snowman friends and have lots of fun as they create a cuddly cat.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: Let's play Follow the Leader! It's easy! All you have to do is touch your toes. Now, touch your nose! That's right, come on.

programme.title: Pix & Leo
programme.desc: Leo is all about getting clean but Pix is having lots of fun getting dirty. Leo is set on getting Pix cleaned up. Will he succeed.

programme.title: My Robot & I
programme.desc: Robots can really come in handy when searching for a lost frisbee in the bushes. Join Kim as she marvels at Kit's ability to trim bushes in the shape of animals.

programme.title: Ahoy Pirates
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ Have you ever flown over a mountain with a hot air balloon made of bubbles? Have you ever crawled upside down on a tree like a lizard? Join Captain Katie, Jon Jon and Beth on their adventures to find the treasure.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Maya and Yaya love eating peaches. Yaya buries his peach pit in the ground, waters it and a peach tree grows. Maya buries a few toys, waters them and waits for a toy tree to grow, but it doesn't happen! Join the two cute elephants to see how Maya's toy tree surprisingly grows! Come along, join the fun and enjoy tasty peaches.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: All My Friends is a fun and cheerful children's rhyme with Lola, Charlie, Henry, Oliver, and Draco signing happily together about friends.

programme.title: Draco
programme.desc: On his way to a trip, Draco puts his toys in a cart, but cannot pull it since there are too many of them in it. Join Draco as he learns the difference between "too heavy" and "lighter" as he empties out the toys from the cart and is able to pull it.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 4 │ Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat.

programme.desc: It's time to relax, slow down and unwind with Kiku. Calming visuals and soft music are great ways to prepare for bed.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join BabyTV in this classic version of The Muffin Man that introduces your little ones to the adorable muffin man delivering baked goods all around town.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come join all your favorite BabyTV friends as they have fun dancing like babies, ride in hot-air balloons, meet a magician, and have wagon races.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: All your favorite BabTV characters are rolling over in the bed. Be careful not to fall out.

programme.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programme.desc: Lale and Lolu find themselves in the magical Viking world. As they sail on their Viking ships they discover the water has disappeared. Will they be able to continue sailing.

programme.title: Musical Melody
programme.desc: Join the musicians as they play beautiful sounds of Divertimento by Mozarts. Step into the lively world of music as you enjoy the snow and penguins.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come clap your hands and stomp your feet with Lola as she rides horses and goes on a picnic with grandpa and grandma.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Daddy Hippo peacefully puts baby Hippo to Bed with this relaxing tune that is sure to get everyone sleepy.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Froggy is blowing soap bubbles in the bathtub! Who's spraying water on him? Ellie is playing ball and Ducky is sleeping on a mattress! Who could it be? Come along and find out! Join the fun and have a great time splashing and laughing in the tub with all the friends and cloud too.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ola, bonjour, hello - "Hello" has different names - in English, French or Spanish. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola has fun with all your favorite characters from the Tiny Bunch. Come join them as they sing the favorite classic "This Old Man".

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his adventures with the green car! As he was driving with Bobby, the car fell into a deep and dark hole! On his journey to find it, Teddy meets a happy mole family! Will the merry moles help him find it? Come along and see.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Yaya enjoys driving his little car and stops to let the ants cross the road. Maya is by her fruit stall but wants to ride the car as well. Join Maya and Yaya as they take turns driving the car safely and enjoy eating delicious and healthy fruit together.

programme.title: Draco
programme.desc: Join Draco as he learns opposites "inside" and "outside" as he tries to tidy up and put all the colorful balls inside the tent. Come and see how Draco manages to put everything inside the tent including the balls, himself and his cute teddy bear.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 10 │ Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: What's more fun than eating cakes and breads? Eating them with your favorite BabyTV characters - Hungry Henry, Billy and Bam Bam, Draco and Oliver.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: The Itsy-Bitsy Spider is trying to climb the waterspout, but with no luck. The rain keeps washing it out. Perhaps the sun can help the poor little spider.

programme.title: Stitches
programme.desc: Needles, Beavie and Bouncy are at the beach. Needles is busy building sandcastles while Beavie and Bouncy are busy splashing about. Needles has a hard time finishing his sandcastle when Beavie and Bouncy accidentally ruin it time and time again.

programme.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programme.desc: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! See the parts and magical butterfly as they connect together to create a castle! Come along and play with Princess Joy, Prince Dylan and the friends in the fascinating castle.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola, Charlie and Henry are baking a delicous cake together. Come find out what you need in order to make the perfect cake.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just pour it out.

programme.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programme.desc: Lale and Lolu explore a colorful castle with a very colorful dragon who loves to play hide and seek.

programme.title: Musical Melody
programme.desc: Join the delightful musicians as they play fine sounds of Rondo by Mozart. Step into the stunning world of classical music as you have fun in the playground riding on slides and swings and listening to chirping birds.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: London Bridge is falling down and everyone is here to help out - Lola, Charlie, Draco, Ollie, Billy and Bam Bam.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: The brave mouse wants to join his friend the bird on the cuckoo clock. He tries climbing, jumping, and flying until he finally manages to unite with his friend.

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his fun day at the office with dad! Listen to Teddy's story about his strong sneeze that blows away papers from dad's desk! Eli the elephant and Jeffrey the Giraffe help Teddy tidy up! A paper plane lifts Teddy to the shelf to collect papers! Finally, enjoy some hot chocolate.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Ellie and Ducky are having fun playing with paint! Ellie wants to sleep but is covered with paint splashes! What shall he do? programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come sing and dance along with Lola, Charlie, Billy and Bam Bam as they touch their head, nose, chin and arms.

programme.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground

programme.title: Happy Lights
programme.desc: Soothing music along with images from our surroundings is sure to put your little ones to sleep.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about the lovely time he spent with grandpa and granny watching the stars at night! One of the stars falls on scarecrow's head and smiles at Teddy! Come along and play hide and seek with Teddy and the star! Help Teddy bring back star to his mum and dad! Good Night.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies

programme.title: Magic World
programme.desc: "Magic World" is a captivating children's program on Baby TV, combining fun and education in every episode. The series showcases delightful animated characters who explore an enchanting realm filled with mythical creatures. Throughout their adventures, young viewers gain essential life lessons, stimulate their imaginations, and learn basic concepts like colors, shapes, and numbers. With its lively music, interactive segments, and engaging narratives, "Magic World" is crafted to entertain and educate the youngest audience, providing a safe and enriching environment for kids to discover and enjoy new experiences.

programme.title: Snail Trail
programme.desc: Join Mr. Snail as he explores fireflies at night! Mr. Snail is afraid of the dark and his torch has gone out! What shall he do? Come along and see the glowing friends he meets! Learn the special language of lights, enjoy the magical firefly song and twinkling light display.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come ride through the town with your favorite BabyTV characters - Baby Butterfly, Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep, Rabit and Squirrel. Riding a bus has never been more fun.

programme.title: Happy Birthday To You
programme.desc: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programme.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programme.desc: Someone is having a birthday party and the bugs are all excited! But a strong gust of wind leaves Hop stranded on a balloon. Laz and Butterson find a clever way of helping him out.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Playing ball with Draco is fun. When the ball flies over the mountain the bear goes over the mountain to look for it. What will he find.

programme.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programme.desc: A flute arrives at Zeina's doorstep, forgetting what it is used for. Using her detective skill and her best friend Roy, Zeina discovers that a flute is used for climbing like a tower... is it.

programme.title: Billy Bam Bam
programme.desc: Billy and Bam Bam have fun picking oranges from the tree and catching them in a bowl. After eating all the tasty oranges, they use the bowls as hats and decorate them with yellow flowers as they enjoy singing and dancing together.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 7 │ Good morning, Friends, and a happy new day! The sun is smiling, the butterflies are singing, the birds are chirping and calling out your name. It's time to wake up and start the day with laughter with Baby and friends.

programme.title: Look What I Found
programme.desc: Join the friends as they play in a sandbox! Use a spade and fill the bucket with golden sand! Come along and use toy spades as oars to row the bucket boat! Sail on a river through magical castles and into the sea! Swim with dolphins and hear the ocean in a seashell! Slide down the hill back into the sandbox.

programme.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programme.desc: Come play a cool guessing game in the snow with the adorable snowies! Guess which animal makes a barking sound! Is it a pig or a bear? Join the cute snowman friends and have lots of fun as they create a sweet seal.

programme.title: Charlie & the Shapes
programme.desc: Charlie and Arrow go in search of water in order to water the wilted flowers. They go in search of spiral who helps bring over some clouds. How will they get the clouds to bring down rain? By tickling them of course.

programme.title: Cuddlies
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 2 │ It is time for bed and everyone is getting ready to go to sleep. Tickles plays a lullaby, Yum Yum prepares a sandwich and Dodo falls asleep. Uh Oh fills up his bed with items so as not to be alone, but it breaks due to overload. Join Uh Oh and his friends as they cheer him up by sleeping over and enjoy a nice pillow fight.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam Bam continue to play pretend and have fun singing the classic rhyme Miss Polly had a Dolly and treat Billy's doll who is sick.

programme.title: Mike's Bikes
programme.desc: Johnny is in desperate need for a new bicycle seat. After a few funny attempts, Mikey finally finds just the right one.

programme.title: Pix & Leo
programme.desc: Leo and Pix are looking for the perfect place to have a picnic. While Leo takes a nap, Pix finds a new friend to play with.

programme.title: Olly
programme.desc: Arrrgg matey! Make way for Olly the pirate. Olly and his friends are on an exciting adventure to find the treasure.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola has fun with all your favorite characters from the Tiny Bunch. Come join them as they sing the favorite classic "This Old Man".

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: Trucky goes to clear some rocks that fell on the road. While trying to pick up a large boulder he turns over on his side and can't get up. Now it's Roady and Voom Vam's turn to help Trucky in his time of need.

programme.title: Crafty Rafty
programme.desc: Come along and have lots of fun with socks! Discover the amazing undersea world! Swim with sock fish among colourful sock coral reefs! Enjoy the small fish made of clothespins and blow button bubbles! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates a crab from a sock with button eyes and pin claws.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ola, bonjour, hello - "Hello" has different names - in English, French or Spanish. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: My Robot & I

programme.desc: What do the animals on the farm sound like? Come join the Egg Band on a trip to the farm and sing along with the animals.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join Baby Butterfly and friends as they sing and dance to this classic and very loved nursery rhyme, The Grand Duke of York. Are you ready to sing along.

programme.title: Play & Learn with the Post Train
programme.desc: Join Fast Frank as he rushes off to deliver a package for Fiona the Frog from Oscar the Octopus! Hop on the train and help find Fiona! Enjoy the vegetable garden and beach on the way! Come find Fiona among insects in the fresh water swamp! Discover what's inside the package! Boots.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: The entire family is having fun playing football outside when it starts raining! With a little help from their imagination, the family finds a fun way of playing football indoors.

programme.title: Jungle Book

programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ Join Captain Katie, Jon Jon, Beth and their faithful monkey Ari as they set sail on an adventure to find the pirate treasure. There will be animals, obstacles, puzzles and parties along the way.

programme.title: What a Wonderful Day
programme.desc: It's lunch time! Join the wonderful friends as they enjoy lunch in the middle of the day! Have a seat and eat a yummy lunch that fills up your tummy! Peas, broccoli and a tasty beet! Oh, what a treat! Take cute teddy in your lap and have a lovely nap.

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: Mick is going home. Join Mick as he discovers various birthday decorations at home, including a birthday chair, a birthday cake with candles, a flower garland, and a present. When he opens the door and sees the guests, he finds out that it's his birthday! Happy Birthday.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Little Lola and Charlie have fun with the animals on the farm. Join them in this classic rendition of Old McDonald. Don't forget to "moo moo" and "oink oink".

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his adventures meeting Ninny the Great magician! Discover what comes out of Ninny's magic hat! Wave the magic wand and see Teddy turn into the tallest bear in the world! Ninny gives Teddy a magic wand so that he can become a magician too.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Maya and Yaya love eating peaches. Yaya buries his peach pit in the ground, waters it and a peach tree grows. Maya buries a few toys, waters them and waits for a toy tree to grow, but it doesn't happen! Join the two cute elephants to see how Maya's toy tree surprisingly grows! Come along, join the fun and enjoy tasty peaches.

programme.title: Draco
programme.desc: Join Draco as he learns the difference between "inside" and "out" as he tries to find a place to hang up a picture of Auntie Dragoona. At first he puts it inside the cupboard, but then decides to hang it on the wall outside for everyone to enjoy.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 5 │ Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam have fun watching the bears make food together. Sometimes things don't go quite as expected but that's part of the fun.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: All your favorite BabTV characters are rolling over in the bed. Be careful not to fall out.

programme.title: Stitches
programme.desc: Needles is playing with his new balloon when he meets Squeaky the mouse. When Squeeky tries to hold on to the balloon he finds himself up in the air. When Bouncy and froggy come to the rescue they also find themselves in the same situation. Will Needles be able to rescue them.

programme.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programme.desc: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the balls, bagels and parts to create a cute monkey! Come along and see the beautiful banana tree that Grandpa plants! Climb with monkey, eat tasty bananas and have fun dancing around the tree.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: The brave mouse wants to join his friend the bird on the cuckoo clock. He tries climbing, jumping, and flying until he finally manages to unite with his friend.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Do you like the sun? All the children want to play with Mr. Golden Sun. Let's ask him to shine down and play with us.

programme.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programme.desc: Lale and Lolu have fun in their imaginary and colorful circus world. They juggle, ride a unicycle and walk the tight rope.

programme.title: Musical Melody
programme.desc: Join the magnificent musicians as they play lovely sounds of Allegro from Flute Quartet by Mozart. Step into the dynamic world of music as you play with cute dolphins and build a sand castle at the beach.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Hippo, Elephant, Baby and Sheep all star in this fun and entertaining rendition of the all-time favorite nursery rhyme.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: What a great day for a boat ride on the lake! Baby, Hippo, Rabbit, Elephant, Giraffe and Sheep have fun singing Row Your Boat while actually rowing their boat.

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his splashy winter day! Listen to Teddy's story about walking and splashing in puddles with dad and friends! Enjoy the wonderful umbrellas as they open up and turn into amazing boats and have fun sailing on the giant puddle.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are having fun fishing in the bathtub! Froggy catches something big! What can it be? A treasure chest, of course! What's inside? Come and see! Join the friends as they open the chest and find a sparkling crown! Come along and find out who rescues the crown when it falls in the tub.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola has fun with all your favorite characters from the Tiny Bunch. Come join them as they sing the favorite classic "This Old Man".

programme.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programme.desc: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the rings to make swing chains and all the parts to create a colourful playground! Come along and have fun going down the slide and swinging on the swing.

programme.title: Happy Lights
programme.desc: Soothing music along with images from our surroundings is sure to put your little ones to sleep.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Hey, Diddle, Diddle is a joyful nursery rhyme that dates back to the sixteenth century and sings of a fiddle-playing cat, a delighted cow, a curious dog, a dish, and a spoon. Adorable characters that every toddler has fun with playing, dancing, and singing along.

programme.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programme.desc: Lale and Lolu climb tall pyramids and play ancient ball games in the jungle.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Playing ball with Draco is fun. When the ball flies over the mountain the bear goes over the mountain to look for it. What will he find.

programme.title: Musical Melody
programme.desc: Join the musicians as they play beautiful sounds of the First Movement by Mozart. Step into the lively world of music as you enjoy watching Chinese dragons on the river.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 2 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ciao, Konnichi wa, Marhaba - "Hello" has different names - in Italian, Japanese or Arabic. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ola, bonjour, hello - "Hello" has different names - in English, French or Spanish. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his adventures with Betty Bear and a bouncy and colourful spring that bounces all over! Join the fun and bounce with the spring on the stairs, in the playground, the amusement park and into the boat on the river.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are having lots of fun sailing on a big boat in the bath! What's blocking their way? Is that a rock? Come along and discover a cute turtle, of course! Join the friends as they carry on and enjoy their amazing journey.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Black Sheep has really got her friends covered! She knits sweaters for Rabbit, Giraffe and Baby and to keep them extra warm she also makes them a scarf and hat.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Charlie, Lola and all their animal friends come together in this fun and humorous rendition of The Farmer in the Dell.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Rabbit Jack leaves his front door open and catches a cold. He can't stop sneezing. His good friend Elephant makes him a hot cup of tea.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ Elephant and Hippo go on a picnic on their boat. Elephant manages to catch a fish but ouch! He got bitten! Come count the fish along with Baby, Hippo and Elephant.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Do you like horseback riding, singing and having lots of fun? Join Little Lola, Charlie, Hungry Henry and friends in this fun and cheerful classic folk song. Let's ride together! Yay.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join BabyTV in this classic version of The Muffin Man that introduces your little ones to the adorable muffin man delivering baked goods all around town.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Toto and Robbie fly with their spaceship to wake up a sleepy star so it can shine through the night.

programme.title: Close Your Eyes

programme.title: Good Night!

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 25 │ U Elmoreu je Noć vještica. Dok djeca po gradu skupljaju slatkiše, zlodusima Elmorea sve je teže preplašiti ljude, pa uzimaju druge poslove da prežive. Mogu li im Gumball i Darwin pomoći da opet postanu strašni.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 43 │ Gumballu na vrata dolazi stari prijatelj Muci. Darwinu je teško prihvatiti da je Gumball imao prijatelja prije njega i kipti od ljubomore. No što ako Darwin ima pravo? Zašto se Muci zapravo vratio.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 37 │ Stjecajem okolnosti Gumball mora nositi odijelo koje je dobio u "Izgubljenim stvarima". Smatrajući da ovako izgleda kao britanski tajni agent, s Darwinom i Bobertom (i puno previše dosjetki) Gumball se daje u potragu za kradljivcem odjeće.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 42 │ Darwin posumnja da mu u životu ne ide zato što sluša Gumballove savjete, pa odluči za promjenu slušati Alana. No možda je vrijeme da Darwin počne donositi svoje odluke.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 17 │ Gumball i Darwin pokušavaju razmijeti što im Juke uznemireno govori putem beatboxa.

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 17 │ Richard čuva djecu, ali njegov opušten stav u kuću obitelji Watterson privlači neželjene goste.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 18 │ Gumball i Darwin pokušavaju snimiti filmski klasik.

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 19 │ Gumball se snimi u nezgodnom trenutku i slučajno stavi video na internet. Postiđen, želi ga pošto poto izbrisati.

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 4 │ Učiteljica Simian mora se spasiti od virusa radosti koji je zarazio cijelu školu.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Očalinko i Lamput slučajno završe na izvanzemaljskom brodu! Srećom, Žgoljavi i Šef dolaze ih spasiti, a Očalinko i Lamput moraju dokučiti kako rabiti teleporter. Hoće li to uspjeti prije nego što ih izvanzemaljci pronađu.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 46 │ Žgoljavi je na spoju, a gost za susjednim stolom je Lamput. Hoće li Žgoljavi moći uskladiti posao i život? Lamput pomaže Žgoljavome zadiviti damu, no hoće li se što promijeniti kad sazna da je njezin dijamantni prsten narančasti mjenjolik.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 6 │ Anton, čije je tijelo od tosta, raspadne se u bazenu, no idući dan pojavi se u školi kao da se ništa nije dogodilo. Zapanjeni, Gumball i Darwin odlučuju otkriti tajnu Antonove besmrtnosti.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 11 │ Nakon što joj Šef zaplijeni čokoladicu, Beth se nađe u paralelnom svijetu divova i želi vratiti svoju, sada divovsku čokoladicu.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 12 │ Kada pileći osip zavlada školom, djeca posjećuju Kraljicu kokoši kako bi joj se ispričala za prošla nedjela, u nadi da će im dati lijek... prije nego bude prekasno.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 13 │ Izzy se ne može natjerati da udari pinjatu tijekom razredne proslave Cinco De Maya. Ali kada pošteđena pinjata oživi i izlegne vojsku zlih pinjata, vrijeme je za akciju.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 14 │ Nakon što Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen i Cody pobijede u prvenstvu u igri skrivača, ljubomorna bivša prvakinja zatoči ih na privatnom otoku i tjera da se igraju skrivača za slobodu.

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 5 │ Djeca konačno dobivaju psića kojeg su oduvijek željeli - samo što je pas zapravo kornjača koja ih mrzi. Kad svi pokušaji da se s njom sprijatelje propadnu, moraju je zaustaviti prije nego što uništi Elmore.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 7 │ Kad Gumball sazna od mame da mu je pravo ime zapravo Zac, preuzima novi, iritantni identitet koji odgovara imenu i počne zaboravljati tko je. Kako ga ne bi izgubili, ostali članovi obitelji daju sve od sebe da ga podsjete na to tko je on.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Budući da se Gumballu i Darwinu tog dana ne događa ništa zanimljivo, sporedni likovi koje smo dosad vidjeli samo u pozadini dolaze u prvi plan.

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 23 │ Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy i Raven ponovo su s nama u seriji MALI TITANI KRENITE!, a ovaj put će gledaoci vidjeti kakav je stvarni život malih superjunaka kad skinu maske. Inspirirano izvornom serijom Warner Bros Mali Titani. Crtana serija koja se prikazuje već pet sezona, komedija s naglaskom na likove - temeljene na likovima iz DC stripova - i usmjerena na humor spašavanja svijeta i zajedničkog života tinejdžera bez nadzora odraslih. Komičan kaos obilježen je psinama i povremenim borbama protiv zločina, no dotiče i svakodnevna pitanja odrastanja. Uz natjecanja u kojima gubitnici peru veš, pothvate izrade savršenog sendviča ili borbe protiv zločina u Jump Cityju, jedno je sigurno - ovi Titani uvijek su spremni za pustolovinu, kod kuće i izvan nje.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Na putu na godišnji odmor, Wattersoni pričaju strašne priče kad im se auto pokvari usred pustinje, no stranac koji im priskače u pomoć previše je nalik liku iz jedne od priča.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 11 │ Nakon što Gumball i Darwin otkriju da ravnatelj Brown nema diplomu, ovaj daje sve od sebe ne bi li ih spriječio da odaju njegovu tajnu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 12 │ Gumball i Darwin shvate da je Molly nestala i da je se nitko ne sjeća. Vjeruje im samo učitelj Small, pa uz njegovu pomoć odlučuju spasiti Molly iz druge dimenzije.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 13 │ Kad gospodin Robinson završi u bolnici, Gumball i Darwin odluče pomiriti ga sa sinom Rockyjem. Kako gospodin Robinson misli da je Rocky razočaranje, dečki Rockyju pomažu naći posao u uredu - ali tvrtka Čaneks nije ono što se čini.

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 6 │ Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy i Raven ponovo su s nama u seriji MALI TITANI KRENITE!, a ovaj put će gledaoci vidjeti kakav je stvarni život malih superjunaka kad skinu maske. Inspirirano izvornom serijom Warner Bros Mali Titani. Crtana serija koja se prikazuje već pet sezona, komedija s naglaskom na likove - temeljene na likovima iz DC stripova - i usmjerena na humor spašavanja svijeta i zajedničkog života tinejdžera bez nadzora odraslih. Komičan kaos obilježen je psinama i povremenim borbama protiv zločina, no dotiče i svakodnevna pitanja odrastanja. Uz natjecanja u kojima gubitnici peru veš, pothvate izrade savršenog sendviča ili borbe protiv zločina u Jump Cityju, jedno je sigurno - ovi Titani uvijek su spremni za pustolovinu, kod kuće i izvan nje.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 5 │ Clarence je entuzijastični 9-godišnji dječak, koji vidi dobro u svemu i svakome i želi probati sve jer mu je sve nevjerojatno! Svi znaju da druženje s Clarenceom, zajedno s njegovim najboljim prijateljima Sumom i Jeffom, svaki dan može pretvoriti u najbolji dan ikada, stoga krenimo zajedno u potpuno nove avanture.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Braća medvjedi
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 22 │ "Braća medvjedi" govori o trojici medvjeđe braće zvane Griz, Panda i Polarni. Slijedite njihove nespretne pokušaje integracije s ljudskim svijetom na području Zaljeva San Francisca, bilo da traže hranu, pokušavaju steći ljudske prijatelje ili spletkare kako bi postali poznati na internetu. Bez obzira na situaciju, očito je da je biti medvjed u civiliziranom, modernom svijetu teško, ali barem imaju jedan drugog.

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 42 │ Očalinko pokušava Lamputa uhvatiti mrežom. Kako mu fizičke aktivnosti ne leže, sebe udari u glavurdu. Udarac ga vrati u djetinjstvo. Pretvara se u plačljivu bebu kojoj je potrebna briga... roditelja? Žgoljavi i Lamput snalaze se kako mogu.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 37 │ Yuki Yoshida vraća se u Elmore i izaziva Nicole na dvoboj. Nicole se ne želi boriti s prijateljicom iz djetinjstva koju je davno pobijedila u karatističkom natjecanju, ali popušta kad joj Yuki zaprijeti gubitkom posla i kuće.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 38 │ Kompilacija najsmješnijih i najbizarnijih videa koje su na internet stavili stanovnici Elmorea. To uključuje akrobacije Banane Joea, Richardov posljednji kulinarski izum i smiješne face malih Wattersona.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 39 │ Rob u Superdućanu nalazi univerzalni daljinski pomoću kojeg može kontrolirati cijeli svemir, pa ga odluči iskoristiti da se osveti Gumballu, koji ga je davno ostavio u Poništenju.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 1 │ Kad smo zadnji put vidjeli Gumballa, upravo je stiskao premotavanje unatrag na Robovu univerzalnom daljinskom upravljaču da se spasi iz Poništenja.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 7 │ Kad Šef kaže da različita mišljenja svijet čine zanimljivim mjestom, Izzy to primijeni na najgori mogući način.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Kad Šefova mama postane zamjenska učiteljica na jedan dan, Duncan Šefov popis aktivnosti zamijeni svojim popisom.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Nakon što pojedu Šefovu vrlo rijetku i skupu čokoladu, Courtney natjera Owena, Izzy i Beth da odu sve do norberških Alpa Fruffenberga kako bi je zamijenili.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Šef gubi svijest taman prije velike provjere ocjenjivačice iz školskog odbora. Sada ga Owen mora zamijeniti kako Šef ne bi izgubio učiteljsku dozvolu i kako bi djeca dobila ponija kojeg im je Šef obećao ako se dobro ponašaju.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Kad se Potokom raširi manija lomòlovke, John slučajno postaje prvak i sad mora dati sve od sebe da obrani naslov.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Posljednji je dan ljeta, posljednja prilika da Craig otkrije drevno blago zakopano ispod Potoka.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 5 │ Kad je uobičajeno stresna obiteljska večera gurne do granice ludila, Nicole se počne sjećati vremena kad je upoznala Richarda. Bi li njezin život bio bolji da nije zastala da porazgovara s budućim mužem? Što da je izabrala drugačiji put.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 6 │ Kad ostanu bez interneta, Gumball saznaje da Wattersoni već godinama kradu wi-fi od susjeda Robinsona. Pokušavaju živjeti bez interneta, ali život bez njega je pretežak, pa Gumball i Darwin hakiraju lozinku gospodina Robinsona.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Gumball is livid when an online test keeps telling him that his character-type is The Loser. The only way to shake off this label is to do the opposite of what he normally would.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Slučajni susret sa ženom njegovih snova nadahne Rockyja da prestane živjeti online i da nađe ljubav uz pomoć aplikacije za upoznavanje. Gumball i Darwin pomažu Rockyju da se snađe u zeznutom svijetu internetske romanse.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Gumball i Darwin žele naučiti Boberta kako da se ponaša sigurno i odgovorno, pa mu daju konkretne upute. Kad Bobert na njihova pravila počne primjenjivati svoju robotsku logiku, shvaćaju da će morati biti jasniji.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 13 │ Nicole (neuspješno) pokušava sakriti razočaranje kad Richard i djeca zaborave njezin poseban dan. Richard prvo mora otkriti zašto je taj dan tako važan, a potom ga učiniti nezaboravnim.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 40 │ Vijesti Kanala 6 prenose sve najvažnije lokalne priče, od policijske potjere do skandala u studiju Magarice Daisy. Voditelj Kip Schlezinger donosi najnovije vijesti, uključujući sport i vrijeme, čak i kad se u gradu ne događa ama baš ništa.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 15 │ Kad joj dojade ružni darovi bake Jojo, Nicole potakne djecu da uzmu stvari u svoje ruke i "slučajno" razbiju užasnu vazu koju je dobila. No kad je Gumball, Darwin i Anais pokušaju uništiti, otkriju da je vaza opornija nego što se čini.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 19 │ Kad Darwin zamoli Gumballa da ga nauči skejtati, Gumball pokriva svaki aspekt skejterskog života - od opreme i žargona do biranja pravog skejtborda. Ali kad Darwin konačno dođe do vožnje, shvaća da ga Gumball nije naučio nečem važnom..

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 12 │ Tijekom ručka s Idahom Darwin odluči prestati jesti krumpir iz solidarnosti sa svojim komp-irom. No riješiti se opsesije omiljenom mu hranom teže je nego što je mislio, pa mu Gumball pomaže da pobijedi svoju žudnju za ugljikohidratima.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 38 │ Gumball i Darwin shvaćaju da odrasli stanovnici Elmorea pojma nemaju o kompjutorima i sigurnosti na internetu. Zapravo im treba pomoć i kod najjednostavnijih zadataka - a najviše njihovoj mami, Nicole.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 44 │ Učenicima Osnovne škole Elmore život se okreće naglavce kad u školu stigne tajnoviti nadzornik. Nadzorniku se nimalo ne sviđa što su takve karikature, ali tko želi biti normalan? Sigurno ne Gumball i Darwin.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 1 │ Gumball i Darwin pokušavaju osvježiti svoje prijateljstvo uvođenjem trećeg prijatelja.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 2 │ Gumball mora gospodinu Robinsonu spasiti život dok ovaj nastupa na talent šou za starije.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 3 │ Gumball pokušava spasiti Darwina od cure koja ga želi poljubiti.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 5 │ Dok Gumball i Darwin "odgovorno" čuvaju Anais, "neodgovorno" poplave kuću.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 6 │ Kad Gumball ode u školu u haljini, neočekivano postaje miljenik Osnovne škole Elmore.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 7 │ Gumball i Darwin izazivaju tatu na natjecanje u lijenosti.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Gumball mora naučiti reći "ne" kad se Carrie, koja je duh, posluži njegovim tijelom protiv njegove volje.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 3 │ Novi trener osnovne škole Elmore prisili Jamie da se pristojno ponaša.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 4 │ Učiteljica Simian mora se spasiti od virusa radosti koji je zarazio cijelu školu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 6 │ Anton, čije je tijelo od tosta, raspadne se u bazenu, no idući dan pojavi se u školi kao da se ništa nije dogodilo. Zapanjeni, Gumball i Darwin odlučuju otkriti tajnu Antonove besmrtnosti.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 5 │ Djeca konačno dobivaju psića kojeg su oduvijek željeli - samo što je pas zapravo kornjača koja ih mrzi. Kad svi pokušaji da se s njom sprijatelje propadnu, moraju je zaustaviti prije nego što uništi Elmore.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 7 │ Kad Gumball sazna od mame da mu je pravo ime zapravo Zac, preuzima novi, iritantni identitet koji odgovara imenu i počne zaboravljati tko je. Kako ga ne bi izgubili, ostali članovi obitelji daju sve od sebe da ga podsjete na to tko je on.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Budući da se Gumballu i Darwinu tog dana ne događa ništa zanimljivo, sporedni likovi koje smo dosad vidjeli samo u pozadini dolaze u prvi plan.

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Gumball je tako loše raspoložen da svojom mrzovoljom zarazi Darwina. Zato što se neprestano žale, građani Elmora pogrešno shvate da moraju pomoći djeci koja su ostala bez ičega.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Na putu na godišnji odmor, Wattersoni pričaju strašne priče kad im se auto pokvari usred pustinje, no stranac koji im priskače u pomoć previše je nalik liku iz jedne od priča.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 11 │ Nakon što Gumball i Darwin otkriju da ravnatelj Brown nema diplomu, ovaj daje sve od sebe ne bi li ih spriječio da odaju njegovu tajnu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 12 │ Gumball i Darwin shvate da je Molly nestala i da je se nitko ne sjeća. Vjeruje im samo učitelj Small, pa uz njegovu pomoć odlučuju spasiti Molly iz druge dimenzije.

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Budući da se Gumballu i Darwinu tog dana ne događa ništa zanimljivo, sporedni likovi koje smo dosad vidjeli samo u pozadini dolaze u prvi plan.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Na putu na godišnji odmor, Wattersoni pričaju strašne priče kad im se auto pokvari usred pustinje, no stranac koji im priskače u pomoć previše je nalik liku iz jedne od priča.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 11 │ Nakon što Gumball i Darwin otkriju da ravnatelj Brown nema diplomu, ovaj daje sve od sebe ne bi li ih spriječio da odaju njegovu tajnu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 12 │ Gumball i Darwin shvate da je Molly nestala i da je se nitko ne sjeća. Vjeruje im samo učitelj Small, pa uz njegovu pomoć odlučuju spasiti Molly iz druge dimenzije.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 14 │ Doktori se odluče poslužiti prečacima. Plakatu za traženu osobu dodaju veliku nagradu. Javnost će odraditi sav posao. Neobično brzo bakica dolazi s Lamputom pod rukom. Stvari polaze po zlu kad ne dobije očekivanu nagradu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 13 │ Kad gospodin Robinson završi u bolnici, Gumball i Darwin odluče pomiriti ga sa sinom Rockyjem. Kako gospodin Robinson misli da je Rocky razočaranje, dečki Rockyju pomažu naći posao u uredu - ali tvrtka Čaneks nije ono što se čini.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 15 │ U strahu da je Harolda u Šefovu otmjenom novom zahodu pojela školjka, djeca odlaze u kanalizaciju u akciju spašavanja. Ali hoće li naći Harolda prije nego što ih mitski Kralj Aligatora zauvijek zatoči u podzemlju.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 17 │ Svjetski je dan rođaka a Owen i Gwen užasnuti su što njihovi rođaci Max i Ella provode dan s njima. Uskoro će svi razumjeti i zašto.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 18 │ Svjetski je dan rođaka a Owen i Gwen užasnuti su što njihovi rođaci Max i Ella provode dan s njima. Uskoro će svi razumjeti i zašto.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 19 │ Duncan pokušava fotokopirati stražnjicu Šefovom otmjenom novom kopirkom i slučajno napravi još jednog Duncana. Sjajno! Drugi Duncan može izvršavati školske obaveze dok pravi Duncan uživa. Ali sve krene nizbrdo kad se i drugi Duncan odluči kopirati kako bi on mogao uživati.

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Gumball je tako loše raspoložen da svojom mrzovoljom zarazi Darwina. Zato što se neprestano žale, građani Elmora pogrešno shvate da moraju pomoći djeci koja su ostala bez ičega.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 27 │ Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy i Raven ponovo su s nama u seriji MALI TITANI KRENITE!, a ovaj put će gledaoci vidjeti kakav je stvarni život malih superjunaka kad skinu maske. Inspirirano izvornom serijom Warner Bros Mali Titani. Crtana serija koja se prikazuje već pet sezona, komedija s naglaskom na likove - temeljene na likovima iz DC stripova - i usmjerena na humor spašavanja svijeta i zajedničkog života tinejdžera bez nadzora odraslih. Komičan kaos obilježen je psinama i povremenim borbama protiv zločina, no dotiče i svakodnevna pitanja odrastanja. Uz natjecanja u kojima gubitnici peru veš, pothvate izrade savršenog sendviča ili borbe protiv zločina u Jump Cityju, jedno je sigurno - ovi Titani uvijek su spremni za pustolovinu, kod kuće i izvan nje.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 16 │ Darwin ne može prestati kihati, pa su Wattersoni uvjereni da je alergičan na glupost. Moraju naći rješenje prije nego što njegovo kihanje uništi grad.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 18 │ Tata je kompjutor zaštitio lozinkom, a pomoćno je pitanje tko je tatino omiljeno dijete. Kad odgovor nije ni "Gumball" ni "Darwin", oni stanu kovati planove protiv Anais i jedan protiv drugoga ne bi li zaslužili naslov omiljenog djeteta.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 19 │ Gumball i Darwin se uvrijede kad ih mama nazove luftinšpektorima, pa obećaju da će iznijeti smeće prije nego što se vrati kući. Dok sat otkucava, pronalaze sve novije načine da odgode banalnu obavezu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 20 │ Gumball mora poljubiti Penny tijekom školske predstave, no slučajno joj razbije ljusku. Njezin tata želi sakriti njeno unutarnje Ja koje mijenja oblik ovisno o raspoloženju, no Gumball joj pomaže da utvrdi tko je zapravo.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Totalna dramarama

programme.title: Totalna dramarama

programme.title: Totalna dramarama

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 20 │ Djed Louie ima novu online prijateljicu - jedini problem je što nije stvarna.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 21 │ Gumball, Darwin i Anais otkriju da gospodin Wilson gotovo cijeli život maltretira njihovog tatu - još od srednje škole. Djeca pokušavaju pomoći tati da se riješi traume, ali začarani krug mogu prekinuti samo ako se osvete gospodinu Wilsonu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 22 │ Tata dobije besplatno šišanje kad frizeru koji mu je rekao da je ćelav ostavi lošu ocjenu na internetu, pa Gumball i Darwin zaključe da se mogu besplatno provoditi ako ostavljaju loše ocjene.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 17 │ Kad Wattersonima stigne tajanstveni paket, obitelj daje sve od sebe da ga ne otvori.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 16 │ Kad otkrije da se Darwinu sviđa cura iz razreda, Gumball ih odluči spojiti.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 23 │ Učiteljica Simian otkriva da je Gumball u vrtiću pao test, što mu ruši prosjek ocjena.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Gumball odlučuje otkriti tko je zatvorio ravnatelja Browna u njegov školski ormarić.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Gumball and Darwin's harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control.

programme.title: Sonik Bum
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Sonik Bum je popularna Segina video igra na osnovu koje je nastala i istoimena serija u kojoj pratimo Sonikove avanture kroz nepreglednu džunglu u kojima ga prate prijatelji Reponja, Ejmi Rouz, Krcko i Jaza. Planove im često kvari glavni neprijatelj dr Robotnik, poznatiji kao Jajomen, i njegovi roboti i verne sluge Orbot i Kjubot. Ovo je serija koja nije namenjena samo deci nego će u njoj uživati i stariji dok se smeju šalama naših junaka jer pored akcije i avanture ova serija obiluje i dobrim humorom.

programme.title: Infiniti Nado
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pre 15 godina na Zemlju je pao neobičan objekat u kojem se nalazilo 20 Infinity Nado igrača. Oni su osnovali svoj Infinity Nado grad, a priča prati njih četvoro koji sa svojim super moćima čine odličan, nepobediv tim. Uskoro otkriju da nisu svi Infinity Nado igrači dobroćudni i da neki imaju plan da unište planetu Zemlju i čovečanstvo... Naša ekipa to neće dopustiti!

programme.title: Slugtera
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Eli i njegovu ekipa, Pronto, Triksi I Kordo Zejn istražuju pećine, izazivaju rivale kao i jedni druge na prijateljske duele, nadograđuju svoju neobičnu opremu i uživaju u ovom uzbudljivom podzemnom svetu! Ali postoji veoma realna pretnja da Dr Blek pretvori slagove u divlje bezumno oružje! Niko do sada nije bio u stanju da se suprotstavi Blekovim moćnim slagovima i vojsci poslušnika.

programme.title: Spin borci
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Soni, Džoni i Roki su nakon osnovnog testa ušli u sto dvadeset šest igrača koji su se kvalifikovali za turnir Spinfajtersa. Udruženje Spinfajter takmičenja poklanja svakom od njih spiner i pištolj koji su podešeni tako da mogu da postignu vrhunske rezultate. Roki je dobio svog ličnog spinera Sonik Matriksa i pištolj Blek Dragon ali on želi da koristi onaj koji mu je tata poklonio - Flejm Fajtera. Posle prve borbe u kojoj ga Džoni ubedljivo pobeđuje on počinje da sumnja u svoj izbor. Međutim u pomoć mu priskače Doktor Vird i poklanja mu spiner Flejm Storm. Da li će naš mladi i neiskusni Roki uz pomoć novog partnera uspeti da nadjača Džonija? Može li da osvoji turnir u čast svog oca? Čeka ga još mnogo izazova.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Dok je radio na rešavanju niza saobraćajnih nezgoda Frenklin Čar biva otet. Ovo aktivira njegove Tobote. Prva dva Tobota su poverena njegovim sinovima Rajanu i Koriju kako bi zaštitili njihov kvart od kriminala.

programme.title: Sonik Bum
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Sonik Bum je popularna Segina video igra na osnovu koje je nastala i istoimena serija u kojoj pratimo Sonikove avanture kroz nepreglednu džunglu u kojima ga prate prijatelji Reponja, Ejmi Rouz, Krcko i Jaza. programme.title: Winx
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Radnja je smeštena u čarobni univerzum koji ima nekoliko dimenzija i u kojem žive vile, veštice i druga mitska bića. Glavni lik je vilinska ratnica Blum koja se upisuje u školu za vile Alfiju da bi trenirala i usavršila svoje veštine. Tim vila koji se bori protiv zlikovaca čine Blum, Stela, Flora, Tehna i Mjuza. Najčešći protivnici su im veštice Ajsi, Darsi i Stormi. Pratite avanture naših junakinja od početka njihovog druženja samo na Dexy TV!

programme.title: Super Cuties
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se malim slatkim junakinjama u njihovim avanturama! One su hrabre i smele te uvek spremne za novu misiju spasavanja sveta!

programme.title: Pepa prase
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Crtana serija, zasnovana na avanturama Pepe i njenog brata Džordža, njene porodice i prijatelja. Pepa obožava da se igra ali i da skakuće po blatnjavim baricama. Svaka njihova avantura se završava uz glasan smeh...

programme.title: Blui
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Blui je šestogodišnje štene rase Australijskog govedara, pastirskog psa, koga karakteriše obilje energije, mašte i radoznalosti prema svetu. Mlada Blui živi sa svojim ocem Benditom, majkom Čili i mlađom sestrom Bingo, koja joj se pridružuje u svakoj avanturi i beskrajnom maštanju kroz igru. Ovaj svetski poznat serijal obiluje raznovrsnim likovima, predstavnicima različitih rasa pasa, a priče koje se pričaju prepoznaćete i sami jer govore o porodici i o odrastanju.

programme.title: Gabina kuća lutkica
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Gabi je devojčica koja će voleti da podeli svoju radost maštanja i igranja sa vama. Saznaćete vrlo brzo da ona obožava sve što ima veze sa mačkama jer su joj najomiljenije igračke upravo one mačkastične, poput nerazdvojnog prijatelja Pandiše, sićušne Magi Mace iz Mijaukovite bašte vila, Mijaufina koji u svojoj kuhinji uvek spremi neko ukusno iznenađenje, Macarene koja je u isto vreme i mačka i sirena i naučnica, raspevanog i uvek vedrog DJ Macana, šarmantnog vragolana Macova i mnogih drugih! Igra, interakcija, dobri stihovi, muzika i raskoš ideja za uvek nove i uzbudljive avanture, sve to vas čeka u Gabinoj Kući lutkica!

programme.title: Maša i medved
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naša glavna junakinja je devojčica Maša čiji je najbolji drug nezgrapan i veliki medved koji je čuva, podučava i igra se sa njom. Zajedno prolaze kroz mnoge komične avanture u koje Maša upada zbog svoje znatiželje i razigranosti. Na kraju se uvek sve dobro reši zahvaljujuci smirenosti i snalažljivosti medveda. Pored njih srećemo i ostale stanovnike šume: zeca, ježa, vukove, vevericu i medvedicu.

programme.title: Visoka duga
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Samo oni sa istančanim ukusom za modu mogu da zakorače u čudesni svet kreativne škole za dizajn Rainbow High. Sedam devojčica moraju se suočiti sa izazovima i razvijati svoje talente u ovoj umetničkoj školi.

programme.title: Fili Fantazija
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Fili Fantazija je nas nov serijal o avanturama Rouzi, ždrebice jednoroga koja pohađa Kraljevsku akademiju magije u kraljevstvu Fantazija. Njeni najbolji prijatelji – Bela, Lin, Vil i Sedrik pohadjaju zajedno sa Rouzi školu I uče kako da poboljšaju svoje magijske veštine, bilo da se radi o mešanju čarobnih napitaka ili bacanja čini. Rouzi takođe mora da se nosi sa svakodnevnim školskim životom tinejdžera dok uči o magičnom svetu oko sebe. U podrumu akademije živi Renglum, zlo čarobnjacko drvoliko stvorenje koje je zarobljeno unutar tamnog ogledala nalik kristalnom zatvoru. Betivigs, slepi miš koji je Vilov i Sedrikov kućni ljubimac u studentskom domu, tajno radi za Rengluma kao njegov nespretni sluga. Renglum i Betivigs smišljaju nacine kako da ukradu sve kristale iz akademije da bi mogli da ostvare cilj - vladati Fantazijom.

programme.title: BFF
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Grupa prijatelja tinejdžera koji će kroz različite avanture otkriti da zajedno mogu proći kroz najteže situacije i postati najbolji prijatelji zauvek!

programme.title: Najbolji krzneni prijatelj
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Družina Best Furry Friends čini šest devojčica – Anđelina, Kasandra, Kristina, Fibi, Stefani i Zoi – i njihovih šest krznenih ljubimaca pomoćnika. Svaka od njih se razlikuje po nečemu od ostalih i gaji strast prema nauci, pevanju ili sportu. Kada su zajedno nijedan izazov nije prevelik za njih.

programme.title: Bibin svet
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Glavna junakinja, Bibi, vesela je i mudra devojčica, uvek spremna da pomogne drugima u nevolji. Na putu na kojem proživljava najrazličitija iskustva, ona nikada nije sama budući da joj društvo pravi najbolji prijatelj Bobi. Za razliku od glavne junakinje, Bobi je nestašan i tvrdoglav i često upada u nevolje. U svojim zajedničkim avanturama, Bibi i Bobi susreću se sa raznolikim stvorenjima – džinovima, zmajevima, naišli su čak i na Deda Mraza, a ni zlu vešticu nisu uspeli da zaobiðu. Ti susreti svima su bili od koristi, a značiće i publici da na zanimljivim primerima nauči kako treba održavati higijenu kuće u kojoj živimo, zašto je važno voditi računa o telu i zdravlju, o pravilnoj ishrani, kako i zašto je važno biti skroman i zahvalan, te kako pomoći prijatelju u nevolji. Svojim vernim gledaocima, Bibi i Bobi će pokazati i šta je najvrednije u prijateljstvu, zašto je bitno da čuvamo životnu sredinu i da ne zagađujemo svoje okruženje, a mnoge teme biće opevane sjajnim pesmicama koje pored poučnih stihova, odišu i izuzetno dopadljivim melodijama. Dobro došli ste svi, u Bibin svet!

programme.title: LOL
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se Rojal Bi, Lejdi Divi, Neon i Sveg dok se ponovo okupljaju u novoj avanturi koju nikada neće zaboraviti. Rojal Bi kupuje restoran i kuću u kojoj su ona i njene tri najbolje prijateljice provele najlepše dane. Ali to postaje kuća iznenadjenja jer joj je potrebno ozbiljno renoviranje a naše junakinje ne znaju sta ih sve čeka.

programme.title: Posebni ljubimci
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se glamuroznim kućnim ljubimcima koji imaju neverovatnu pažnju i negu, na njihovim neobičnim avanturama.

programme.title: Crybabies
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Slatke male bebe istražuju maštoviti svet u kojem su suze magične i nose posebne moći. Suze pokreću emocije ljubavi ili sreće dok bebe zajedno prevazilaze izazovne situacije.

programme.title: Kokomelon
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naučite slova, brojeve, zvukove životinja i još mnogo toga u ovoj muzičkoj seriji koja donosi zabavu za celu porodicu uz dečije pesme! Pevajte zajedno sa nama dok učite i zabavljate se!

programme.title: Pinokio
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pinokio sanja da postane pravi dečak i upušta se u različite avanture! Zajedno sa vernim prijateljima, on je uvek spreman da istražuje svet koji ga okružuje, a najviše prodavnicu svog oca Đepeta.

programme.title: Pirata i Kapetano
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Dok Pirata za kormilom svog broda, Ružičaste lobanje, putuje Velikim morem, njena verna posada prati je u brojnim avanturama. Piratin najbolji prijatelj, Kapetano, upravlja crvenim hidroavionom i pridružuje se nautičkim istraživanjima. Zaplovite sa našim junacima u uzbudljivu potragu za blagom, punu avanture i zabave, naučićete mnogo o vrednostima timskog rada i pravog prijateljstva.

programme.title: Akedo
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Milioni se takmiče ali samo jedan igrač može biti ultimativna Akedo legenda! Džet, Brija i Kab su odlučni da postanu legende u Akedo šampionatu. Daju sve od sebe da poboljšaju svoje veštine kako bi postigli svoj cilj. Na putu ka cilju će im se isprečiti Vord I njegovi igrači koji su jedan od najvećih timova I najjači protivnik u Akedu.

programme.title: Slugtera
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Eli i njegovu ekipa, Pronto, Triksi I Kordo Zejn istražuju pećine, izazivaju rivale kao i jedni druge na prijateljske duele, nadograđuju svoju neobičnu opremu i uživaju u ovom uzbudljivom podzemnom svetu! Ali postoji veoma realna pretnja da Dr Blek pretvori slagove u divlje bezumno oružje! Niko do sada nije bio u stanju da se suprotstavi Blekovim moćnim slagovima i vojsci poslušnika.

programme.title: Tobot Daedo
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naši voljeni prijatelji, Toboti su se vratili! Zle robotske sile su nestale iz grada Daedo. Toboti više nisu potrebni da bi spasili stvar, i polako postaju obična urbana legenda. Nakon što su mnogi njihovi prijatelji otišli u različite gradove, Rajli, Kori i Dilan su sada učenici petog razreda. Frenklin i Limo zajedno mirno vode mehaničarsku radnju, ali odlučuju da su Toboti još jednom potrebni da zaustave nove zle robote koji su se pojavili u gradu Daedo. Uživajte u novoj, duhovitoj priči sa Tobotom X, Y i Z i njihovim pilotima - Rajlijem, Korijem i Dilanom! Gledajte kako naši prijatelji, Novi Toboti, sarađuju kako bi zaštitili grad Daedo od novih zlikovaca!

programme.title: Gabina kuća lutkica
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Gabi je devojčica koja će voleti da podeli svoju radost maštanja i igranja sa vama. Saznaćete vrlo brzo da ona obožava sve što ima veze sa mačkama jer su joj najomiljenije igračke upravo one mačkastične, poput nerazdvojnog prijatelja Pandiše, sićušne Magi Mace iz Mijaukovite bašte vila, Mijaufina koji u svojoj kuhinji uvek spremi neko ukusno iznenađenje, Macarene koja je u isto vreme i mačka i sirena i naučnica, raspevanog i uvek vedrog DJ Macana, šarmantnog vragolana Macova i mnogih drugih!
